name: EscpE: Godot Wild Jam 43
description:
Game created by:

BackAt50Ft (https://twitter.com/Crystal_Climber) (coding)

Chachanii - chachanii_music@outlook.com (music)

gear - raegstudio (art)

Pixel_ - pixel_strengthTWITCH_YT (coding)

Llama - Llamadrama159 (story, dialog, various)

Summary:

You can use wasd or arrow keys to move around. You're a slime trying to rescue other monsters in this place. When you combine with them, you gain powers that will help you to solve puzzles. Be careful of the police - they will instantly end your game!
